definition: a detailed critical inspection, be a student of a certain subject
details:
noun
- a detailed critical inspection
= synonyms: survey
- preliminary drawing for later elaboration
= synonyms: sketch
- a room used for reading and writing and studying
= example: a room used for reading and writing and studying
- a state of deep mental absorption
= example: a state of deep mental absorption
- applying the mind to learning and understanding a subject (especially by reading)
= synonyms: work
- attentive consideration and meditation
= synonyms: cogitation
- a branch of knowledge
= synonyms: subject, discipline, field, subject area, subject field, field of study, bailiwick
- a composition intended to develop one aspect of the performer's technique
= example: a composition intended to develop one aspect of the performer's technique
- a written document describing the findings of some individual or group
= example: a written document describing the findings of some individual or group
= synonyms: report
- someone who learns quickly and easily, as the lines for a part in a play
= example: someone who learns quickly and easily, as the lines for a part in a play
verb
- be a student of a certain subject
= synonyms: take, read, learn
- learn by reading books
= example: learn by reading books
= synonyms: hit the books
- be a student
= example: be a student
- consider in detail and subject to an analysis in order to discover essential features or meaning
= synonyms: canvas, canvass, analyze, analyse, examine
- to think intently and at length, as for spiritual purposes
= example: to think intently and at length, as for spiritual purposes
= synonyms: meditate, contemplate
- give careful consideration to
= synonyms: consider
